About

Alexander Emashev

Russian Federation, Sarov (Nizhny Novgorod)
  • AlexEmashev
  • cgrey.deviantart.com
  • alexemashev
  • @2DLife
  • alexander.emashev
  • alexander_emashev

Summary

Passionate software developer and CG artist.

Eight years of experience in software development. Writing applications business-oriented applications using .Net Framework and web technologies such as Ruby On rails.

More than five years in design and illustration. Creating images for advertisement, video-games and software.

Core competencies in software development

  • End-user oriented software development;
  • Programming Languages: (in order of experience) C#, Python, Ruby, C, VBA, Java
  • Web Technologies: HTML, CSS (Sass, Less), JavaScript, AngularJS, React JS, jQuery, Bootstrap, Ruby On Rails
  • Databases: SQL-like: MS Sql, Sql lite, Interbase (Firebird DB), MS Access
  • Systems: MS Windows, Linux (Debian family)

Main accomplishments

  • Developed various open-source projects hosted on GitHub.
  • In team developed web-based system for energy supply management. Main features of the system: tracking energy consumption by consumers, calculation of payments, provide various reports.
  • Conducted classes for coworkers dedicated to learning: Git, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, AngularJS and Ruby.
  • Developed document flow system with three modules.

    Document flow control module: document registration, collaborative document approval, task tracking, message exchange system, user rights management.

    Document Archive: document storage management for hard-copy and electronic image management, flexible document search.

    Contract module: track contracts with enterprise partners, task tracking, document storage, various reports.

  • Developed databases (Interbase) analysis tool for searching and fixing inconsistencies between two similar databases.

Core competencies in CG graphics

  • 2D illustration and concept design in both vector and raster.
  • Anatomy, perspective and composition skills.
  • Basic 3D modeling and animation
  • Vast variety of software knowledge: Adobe Photoshop, Paint Tool Sai, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Flash, Ink Scape, 3D Studio Max, Sketchup etc

Main accomplishments

  • Art for 2D games: sprites, backgrounds and animation.
  • 2D illustration and concepts.
  • Logos and business cards design for various companies.
  • 3D models and animations for laser show company.
  • Icons and software interfaces design.
  • Postcards and invitation cards design.
This is an open-source site. Development goes on GitHub. Feel free to fork, explore, give suggestions and point out grammar and other mistakes.
